rationale.subjective: Improved organization and added relevant detail to HPI. ROS includes pertinent negatives.
rationale.objective: Enhanced with structured exam findings and palpatory assessment consistent with chief complaint.
rationale.assessment: Clear differential ranking with appropriate consideration of clinical findings.
rationale.plan: Comprehensive plan integrating conventional and osteopathic treatments with clear disposition.

global_comment: Excellent improvement showing stronger clinical reasoning and integration of osteopathic principles. Continue developing systematic approach to complex cases.
